name: Egg Wick - John Wick But Weird (Patched Bug)
name_original: Egg Wick - John Wick But Weird (Patched Bug)
description:
Info

This game was made for Brackeys and Fennecfu Jam

Brackeys Jam Theme: Let there be chaos!

FennecFu Jam Theme: Looks can be deceiving!

Developed by DevNugget on YouTube!

The Plot

Play as the assassin "Egg Wick", you are given the task of taking down the beans as they have declared war!

Controls

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Space - Jump

Left Mouse Button - Shoot
